text: A fala Isirayila yamaan xa, i naxa, ‘Marigina Alatala ito nan falaxi, a naxa: N nan n ma yire sariɲanxin sariɲanna kalama nɛn, ɛ wɛkilɛn sɔtɔma naxan yi, ɛ yɛtɛ matɔxɔma naxan yi, naxan fan ɛ yɛɛ ra yi dangu yire gbɛtɛ ra, ɛ niin naxan fari. Nayi, ɛ dii xɛmɛne nun ɛ dii tɛmɛn naxanye luxi Yerusalɛn yi, ne faxama nɛn silanfanna ra.
